name: Reincarnated as a Scumbag, I Use My Wife and Daughter to Prove Immortality
author: 绘星动漫
content: A mighty Da Luo immortal, gravely wounded, descends to the mortal world and reincarnates into the body of the scumbag Jiang Tianchen. After a thousand years of being single, he encounters a gang trying to assault his wife and take his daughter — so he beats them down without mercy! If they’re dark, he’s darker! Anyone who comes will be drained dry, turning all enemies into cultivation resources for him, his wife, and his daughter on their path to immortality!
